title: The development permission may be granted at the discretion of the CIDCO with following conditions of the Commencement Certificate
clause_text: The development permission may be granted at the discretion of the CIDCO with following conditions of the Commencement Certificate. The applicant shall remove all the development on land when directed by the CIDCO.
section: (2) 10.14.3 Development of land Notified for Acquisition

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The development permission may be granted at the discretion of the CIDCO with following conditions of the Commencement Certificate.
